description_html: Patterns Amaya and Tacana are a result of Pollack’s design collaboration with acclaimed London design firm A Rum Fellow, which promotes the vibrant hand-woven textile heritage of the Maya of Central America. The Pollack + A Rum Fellow collection celebrates these intricate geometric motifs and joyful colors, and imbues the fabrics with the durability and versatility—via Sunbrella® construction—that befits today’s lifestyle. Both patterns are made up of 73% Sunbrella solution-dyed acrylic and 27% Sunbrella solution-dyed polyester, and have a stain-resistant finish. Due to spun fill yarn, Sunbrella Contract fabrics have a soft hand while remaining bleach cleanable. Featuring exceptional UV performance and ultimate cleanability, the fabric is woven in the USA with Sunbrella solution-dyed fibers. All fabrics exceed ACT heavy-duty standards.
